about_the_game:
Enter Euteria—otherwise known as the "RHYTHM REALM"

In this world:

Pigs talk,

Olives walk,

And the muses watch over everything.

Play as Jim Gino, a mute boy with a special sword and the power to sense rhythm in his enemies' movements.

Features

  • Battles in the form of a rhythm minigame, all accompanied by an original soundtrack

  • A 10-15 hour adventure with many sidequests and hidden areas to explore

  • A colorful world with both familiar and bizarre environments

  • Zany characters and dialogue

  • Various power-ups and items to aid players who lack rhythm

  • Puzzles ranging from small brain to big brain

  • Spaghetti and meatballs

  • Pet rock

Does NOT Feature

  • Level grinding

  • Escort quests

  • Excessive backtracking

  • Microtransactions

Warning: Game contains imagery that may be harmful to players with photosensitive epilepsy.

short_description: The lizardman mob boss condemned your village to a slow, catchy death. One boy, one sword: do you have what it takes to venture through this magical world of music and save them all?
